55 41 11 00 68 04 01 00 77 02 36 02 00 2C 04 00 00 00 00 00 00
55 44 11 00 68 04 01 00 FE 01 36 02 00 2C 04 00 00 00 00 00 00
55 4D 11 00 68 04 01 00 77 02 36 02 00 2C 04 00 00 6C 07 00 00
55 51 11 00 68 04 01 00 EB 00 39 01 00 CC 91 00 00 50 C3 00 00
55 6B 11 00 68 04 01 01 EB 00 39 01 00 CC 91 00 00 00 00 00 00
55 6E 11 00 68 04 02 00 2F 00 B3 0F 00 CD 00 00 00 00 00 00 00

01=武器
02 =配件
00 = 一号栏位
01 = 二号

55 22 0B 00 68 00 03 0E 00 00 00 00 00 00 65
